title: The complications of traditional uvulectomy and concurrent occurrences of cultural malpractices in Ethiopia: A systematic review and meta-analysis
content:
Publication date: 15 October 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 19

Author(s): Tamirat Getachew, Abraham Negash, Sinetibeb Mesfin Kebede, Abera Cheru, Addis Eyeberu, Abera Kenay Tura
